channel.title: If your a good coder look here!
channel.description:
Ok I need Several things and due to the amount of help i have received previously on this forum i doubt any1 will help i need:
A direct Code for ::noclip that doesnt ban normal players or any of that shit, just kicks them if they are below integer i allow probably >= 3
A Direct Code for a xplock command dont tell me go into files and declare shit etc u gotta give me exact command and tell me exactly what to do, this area of coding isnt my expertise. Sorta need a spoonfeed there.
Some advice on how to edit items that are obtainable in shops,
And finally but least important how to permanantly keep a npc in a location, i use ::npc (id) in server then compile and restart and it is gone used to work on old source how do i do it now?
Thankyou For Taking The Time For Reading This I Hope You Can Help Ill be back in a few hours expecting no replies but maybe someone out there will help :o

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

Dont bother with disconnected = false;

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

Slave Scyth:

Noclip is completely client-sided. You can BLOCK it server-sided, because it’s still a message packet sent to the server (let’s wait for a smart cheater to fix that), but otherwise: none of it is server-sided.

thanks for correcting me i’m a bit of a newb

heres a code i came up with to keep non high lvl admins from nocliping

else if(command.startsWith("noclip")) { disconnected = true; if (playerRights >= 3) { disconnected = false; } }

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:10, topic:322819”][quote author=Ike TeeHee link=topic=419219.msg3080468#msg3080468 date=1262120805]
i usta have the same noclip problem… all you do is go in client.java and find noclip command… delete it

usualy that fixes eveything because noclip is a client side command not server side

when its in the server its usualy to keep from just anyone using it
[/quote]Noclip is completely client-sided. You can BLOCK it server-sided, because it’s still a message packet sent to the server (let’s wait for a smart cheater to fix that), but otherwise: none of it is server-sided.[/quote]

Hmmmm… I think ill try to figure this out. The cheating part of course

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

when its in the server its usualy to keep from just anyone using it[/quote]Noclip is completely client-sided. You can BLOCK it server-sided, because it’s still a message packet sent to the server (let’s wait for a smart cheater to fix that), but otherwise: none of it is server-sided.

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @Jonnydpickle Jonnydpickle
item.description:
@Jonnydpickle wrote:

Theres no point in everyone spoonfeeding you, your not going to learn jack if you just keep asking people for commands try to make it urself mess around with java a little bit.

i doubt any1 will help i need
ur not asking for help your asking for someone basically to make ur server for you

Read full topic

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @Ike_TeeHee Ike TeeHee
item.description:
@Ike_TeeHee wrote:

i usta have the same noclip problem… all you do is go in client.java and find noclip command… delete it

usualy that fixes eveything because noclip is a client side command not server side

when its in the server its usualy to keep from just anyone using it

item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @xlogga123 xlogga123
item.description:
@xlogga123 wrote:

go to autospawn.cfg in config and copy one of the others and do ::mypos ig u can see xpos:2648 ypos 2659

spawn = 212	2661	3302	0	2663	3304	2659	3300	1

npc id the first one is xpos the second is ypos
xpos 2661 ypos 3302
make your copy and change the id for npc and change xpos and ypos to the pos ur standin on
it worked for me

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

Ok I need Several things and due to the amount of help i have received previously on this forum i doubt any1 will help i need:

A direct Code for ::noclip that doesnt ban normal players or any of that shit, just kicks them if they are below integer i allow probably >= 3

That, sir is client sided

A Direct Code for a xplock command dont tell me go into files and declare shit etc u gotta give me exact command and tell me exactly what to do, this area of coding isnt my expertise. Sorta need a spoonfeed there.

Rip it straight out of a server with an exp lock.

Some advice on how to edit items that are obtainable in shops,

Find your NPC ID then search for wanneshop

And finally but least important how to permanantly keep a npc in a location, i use ::npc (id) in server then compile and restart and it is gone used to work on old source how do i do it now?

Use autospawn.cgf

Thankyou For Taking The Time For Reading This I Hope You Can Help Ill be back in a few hours expecting no replies but maybe someone out there will help :o

Now its my time to talk:

I suggest you get an old base: take phonescape or cheezscape 80. DO NOT MAKE A BIG SERVER THESE OLD SERVERS ARE GLITCHY!!! Instead read through the code, look at how shops and NPCs are spawned and look all through client.java Start to look at cases, packets e.t.c.

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

gf you tried:

A Direct Code for a xplock command dont tell me go into files and declare shit etc u gotta give me exact command and tell me exactly what to do, this area of coding isnt my expertise. Sorta need a spoonfeed there.

If it’s out of your area of expertise then how about you learn how to do it. What a concept. It’s not our responsibility to “give you the exact command and tell you exactly what to do with it”. Beggars can’t be choosers.

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @akman15324 akman15324
item.description:
@akman15324 wrote:

Here’s what server said but in a nicer way. Go to config folder, and open autospawn.cfg. Then put this
spawn = NPC ID-TAB-Xcoord-TAB-Ycoord-0-tab-0-tab-0-tab-0-tab-1
then you compile and restart.

Read full topic
item.source: If your a good coder look here!

item.title: If your a good coder look here!
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

not needing to be spoonfed?!?!?

Dude the npc thing is real easy. go into your autospawn and add the npc id and coords…please try using the search bar. It helps for easy problems like this.

Read full topic
